textarea[name=conceptDescription]:hover{filter:drop-shadow(0 0 2px #30303048)}form textarea[name=conceptDescription]::placeholder{color:#ccc}form code:empty:before{content:attr(data-text);color:#ccc}form select{appearance:none;padding:12px;width:70%;border-radius:4px;border:none;filter:drop-shadow(0 0 1px rgba(48,48,48,.18));background-color:#fefefe}form select:hover{filter:drop-shadow(0 0 2px #30303048);cursor:pointer}form .form-button-container{display:flex;flex-direction:row-reverse;padding-top:36px;margin-right:10px}form .form-button-container button{align-self:flex-end}form h1{font-size:24px;font-weight:500}form h1.validate-message{font-size:14px;margin-top:36px;font-weight:400;color:#e56b45;text-align:right;padding-right:26px}form button#edit-content-delete,form button#edit-task-delete{display:none;margin-right:auto}form button.close-form{position:absolute;top:24px;right:24px;padding:12px;display:flex;justify-content:center;background-color:#fefefe;border-radius:4px}form button.close-form:hover{background-color:#eee;cursor:pointer}form.update button#edit-content-delete,form.update button#edit-task-delete{display:flex}form input{border:none;filter:drop-shadow(0 0 1px rgba(48,48,48,.18));border-radius:4px;padding:12px;font-size:14px;background-color:#fefefe;width:60%}form input:required,form input:required:focus,form input:required:hover{filter:drop-shadow(0 0 2px #e56b45)}form input:focus,form input:hover{filter:drop-shadow(0 0 2px #30303048)}form input[name=taskEstimatedTimeHr],form input[name=taskEstimatedTimeMin]{font-size:14px;width:70px}form input[type=radio]{display:none}form input[type=radio]~span{font-size:14px;padding:12px 18px;display:flex;border-radius:4px;background-color:#fefefe;filter:drop-shadow(0 0 1px rgba(48,48,48,.18))}form input[type=radio]~span:hover{filter:drop-shadow(0 0 2px #30303048);cursor:pointer}form input[type=radio]~span div{width:12px;height:12px;border-radius:12px;margin-right:8px}form input[type=radio]:checked~span{background-color:#303030;color:#fefefe}form .radio-container{display:flex;gap:12px}form label{display:block;font-size:12px;text-transform:uppercase;padding-left:12px;margin:24px 0 4px;color:#909090}form label[for=taskEstimatedTimeMin]{position:relative;left:-10px}form label[for=taskEstimatedTimeHr],form label[for=taskEstimatedTimeMin]{margin:0;padding:0;display:initial;width:70px}form label[for=taskEstimatedTimeHr] span,form label[for=taskEstimatedTimeMin] span{position:relative;right:60px}form label[for=taskPriorityRating]{display:flex;flex-direction:column}form label.false-radio{margin:0;padding:0}form label.false-radio:hover{cursor:pointer}form label.false-radio span{background-color:#fefefe;color:#909090;padding:14px}form label span.required{color:#e56b45}@media only screen and (max-width:700px){#home-link{display:none}header{height:48px}body main .tab#tasks-tab{left:16px;content:"Tasks"}body main .tab#content-tab{left:165px;content:"Content"}#tasks div.column{width:75vw;max-width:332px}#tasks.list div.column div.title{padding:0 0 6px}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:flex-start;padding:16px;filter:drop-shadow(0 0 2px #30303018);margin:16px 0;min-width:0;width:auto}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card span.tag.subject{margin:0 0 12px}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card span.tag.subject:empty{display:none}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card div.time-details span.tag.subject~h3{max-width:none;margin:0;white-space:normal;width:100%}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card hr{display:inline;width:100%}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card p{white-space:normal;overflow:auto;display:inline;max-width:100%;margin:6px 0}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card .edit{position:absolute;top:12px;right:16px}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card div.time-details{width:100%}#tasks.list div.column div.cards article.card div.time-details h4{margin-right:auto}form#add-column-form,form#add-group-form{max-width:80%}form section{grid-template-columns:auto;grid-template-rows:auto auto}form .button.primary.icon{display:flex;width:48px;height:48px}.button-container .button.primary.icon:hover{background-color:rgba(9,153,127,.8627450980392157)}.button-container .button:not(:last-child){margin-right:0;margin-bottom:12px}.button-container .button.create{background-color:#fefefe;color:#303030;display:none;visibility:hidden}.button-container .button.create:hover{background-color:#eee}.button-container .button.active{display:flex;visibility:visible}}@media only screen and (max-width:500px){.tooltip{display:none!important}form section div.form-button-container,form div.form-button-container button:first-child{margin:0}#tasks.list div.column,#tasks.list div.column:first-child,#tasks.list div.column:last-child{margin:36px 36px h1,.pop-up[state=active]#time #stopwatch h1{margin-left:calc(50% - 112.5px);left:0}.pop-up[state=active]#music #stopwatch h1~div,.pop-up[state=active]#time #stopwatch
